website_summaries.verdict: This 14-piece nursery kit is conveniently organized and is affordable. Perfect for parents on-the-go or to use at home.
pros: Expansive, lightweight 14-piece kit with zip-around storage case, conveniently organized with inside pockets
Case has extra room for additional items
Products are durable and last for years
cons: Nasal aspirator is a bit large and may not be small enough to use on infant

customer_reviews.title: Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a gift for a gender reveal party. It had every item as expected. Since it was very affordable you get what you pay for. I wasn't too happy the " boo boo" ice pack had more air in it than gel to freeze. The little "boo boo" pack was the selling point for me. Perhaps because it was small. Returning wasnt an option for me because I ordered too close to the party date. I didnt want to attend empty handed. I'm sure the selling company takes good care of their return/exchange inquiries.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer doesn’t seem accurate. The “ice pack” came busted. Like the emery boards and the brush. Haven’t used much else.
customer_reviews.author: julie felton

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I like this but I wouldn't say I'd but it again. The quality is so-so. The nail clippers were coming apart when they arrived so I've been nervous to use them on my infant. The tip on the nose bulb is far too large to fit into my son's nose, so it's not even useable to be.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Like this Project but what has been said in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for baby usual Health monitoring and Grooming.This product comes with a bag which can hold all those materials inside it. Like this Project but what has been said in the web description. I didn't get this product on any offer or discount.
customer_reviews.author: Saran

customer_reviews.title: Very sub par products
customer_reviews.text: I was confused as to why it was priced over 15 bucks for something made so cheap. When I got it in the mail, there were actually two sets in my box. To beat all.. One set was missing the brush and the aspirator was broken. Since I was able to combine them to make a nice functional set, I just went with it and didn't bother to do a return because I didn't want the hassle. You would probably be best to just go buy a set from Wal-Mart, this one is just so cheap that I may even buy a different soon lol
customer_reviews.author: Billie Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the kit solely for the thermometer and the thermometer stopped working about a week after I got it. I tried changing the battery but that didn’t fix it. You get what you pay for. I did use the other items for my grandson so it wasn’t a total wash.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lemma

customer_reviews.title: baby shower
customer_reviews.text: perfect starter set for new mom and the case keeps it all together and organized
customer_reviews.author: theresa johnson

customer_reviews.title: Generally speaking I liked this kit
customer_reviews.text: Generally speaking I liked this kit. However, the booger-sucker was way, way to big to use on a newborn. I ended up having to go buy a smaller one. The tip couldn't even fit into my little one's nose. Everything else was satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Deathblade

customer_reviews.title: Invest in something better....
customer_reviews.text: Carrying case is cute. Most products are of a doll set/kids toy quality though and aren't of much use. Purchased due to cheap price and decent reviews. I'd recommend spending the extra $$ and getting something nicer...
customer_reviews.author: candace montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the thermometer. It broke after the first use. It is not liquid-proof or even liquid resistant. I simply wiped it down instead of washing it after usage (gross, I know) because it seemed poor quality. It still broke.
customer_reviews.author: Wid

customer_reviews.title: Great except for clippers.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with most of the items include in this. 4 stars because the clippers just bent baby boys tiny nails and wouldn't cut them.
customer_reviews.author: AndiG

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was not satisfied with this purchase and thought the kit was over priced and poor quality. It looked a lot better online than what actually came. I also didn't like how when it arrived some of the pieces were all jumbled around, I hope it wasn't a return! I would not recommend getting this kit, I think that you can find better quality kits around the same price or less at any baby store.
customer_reviews.author: JenV

customer_reviews.title: GREAT and ESSENTIAL
customer_reviews.text: has everything you need in a convenient case. It's an important part of my changing table routine. The clippers and the brush are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Old and crusty
customer_reviews.text: It came dusty and it looked as if it had been in storage for at least a decade. The ice packet was crusted over, the thermometer did not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy

customer_reviews.title: This kid came with things that you will need I've ...
customer_reviews.text: This kid came with things that you will need I've used the brush, fingernail clippers, file, and I've tried to use the little sucker bulb however this did not work very well. I ended up buying one of the generic blue ones with the long nose.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. Literally carried it around bwith be everywhere. However I recommend a different nose sucker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have all these essentials in one bag
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have all these essentials in one bag. I recommend buying a different thermometer, this one is pretty flimsy...plus for head thermometers are way faster. Everything else though works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: An adequate kit. Not the best quality but will do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Mass

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great set! I love having all the little tools ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great set! I love having all the little tools I need for baby care in one set. And it was very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality products, the nose bulb has no suction, and everything else you could find cheaper but better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Walt and Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and they loved it good price for the items
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great kit but buy a different aspirator
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit, that gives you the stuff that you will use except for the aspirator being huge but I'm noticing that most all kits seem to have huge aspirators for some reason. Overall it's a kit that's better than any other I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: SirScott

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a nearly empty gel pack, nasal aspirator doesn't seem to have much suction and brush seems a little stiff. Meh. I could have done better buying the items separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: There are some useful things in here; we use the brush. The thermometer seems really slow to me and the "cold pack" contained mostly air, with a little gel around the edges. Useless. We did use the little emery boards at first, but have found that we get more done with a regular-size one. We haven't been successful in clipping her nails without pinching her, so we don't use the clippers. As a new mom, I wasn't sure what all I would need, so this was fine. It wasn't too expensive. But if you know what you want, you might be happier buying each item separately.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stayton

customer_reviews.title: Must have set
customer_reviews.text: It's very helpful set for babies in their first year. I used them for my Kids and bought some More to my cousin and my sister's babies as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice baby product
customer_reviews.text: 1. Nice product for the money 2. The quality of the items are very good and very soft for the newborn babies. 3. Brush and comb are soft and very useful for the baby. 4. Each and every item in this kit is meant for the babies, I would definitely recommend this product for those who are expecting and don't know which one to choose.
customer_reviews.author: Star1007

customer_reviews.title: Basic baby stuff
customer_reviews.text: Efficient.Saw a white one after placing order. Difference just cosmetic.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: this was part of a Baby Shower gift and it ...
customer_reviews.text: this was part of a Baby Shower gift and it went over with quite a bang
customer_reviews.author: Midget

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day. It's a great little kit and it's cheap!
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Loved This Essentials Pack
customer_reviews.text: It's been 3 years since I purchased this. The thermometer works great; still use it. The brush is nice too. My 3 year daughter loves it. The gum massager is great! She loved it while teething. The other items worked fine for the few times I used them. I would recommend this product. I took a lot of time to review & compare options for this product. It seemed to be a happy medium as far as price & quality.
customer_reviews.author: Campanula

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend thousands of miles away and it got to her house exactly when it was supposed to get there and she absolutely loved this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool, all in one place and products are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lomakila

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy to have product. The nasal aspirator(snotsucker) is surprisingly good. A must have for every mother!
customer_reviews.author: Chriso

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love all the products. Made an awesome baby shower gift. Would highly recommend it for anyone looking for that perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: newmexicoamazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little toolkit for traveling or just keeping in the house.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA KENNEDY-SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All super important stuff. Nice to have around! Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Babb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: Nice essential kit, My wife is happy with this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the contents of this kit. However, the comb, which was one of the things I got the kit for was very impractical to use. It is designed with balls on every other teeth of it and causes the comb to entangle and pull my baby's hair every time I combed it. I guess it might be a safety feature but it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift and Mommy-to-be loved it. Great gift item
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Pass on it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set when my little one arrived a year ago, because I thought I NEEDED it. But in all honesty I have barely touched it at all. The nail clippers and the nasal aspirator are just plain awful! The thermometer wasn't very accurate, the gel pad is pretty tiny. The brush and toothbrush are ok, and the comb is what it is... a comb. This definitely is not a must-have in my book. You are better off sticking with the bulb syringe from the hospital, and buying the other item as needed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schacht

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I know the price of this item is appealing, but the actual kit is very cheap quality. The nasal suction was just horrible (mine arrived broken). I returned this kit immediately after receiving it. Would only recommend under dire circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Hair brush very good.
customer_reviews.text: Nail clipper doesn't work as smooth as expected. Hair brush very good.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Yang

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it,don't take it  not even for free!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for a good priced effective product for our newborn,if u r looking to throw your money in the trash it would be easier than buying this product,the thermometer came without battery and stopped working within the first week of use,the nasal suction is big even for my nose(30 years old)and u won't be able to use it on an infant,the only thing that works is the comb. bottom line spend few more dollars and get a decent set
customer_reviews.author: jello_81

customer_reviews.title: you dont use everthing that comes in there
customer_reviews.text: Being a first time mom I wasnt sure what all I would need and so bought this. However, you wont need everything that comes in there. I why do you need so many emery boards. Also I like to use a temporal thermometer. and most of the things like thermometer, bulb, medicine dispenser you get those at the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The products are correct I recommend it thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Yaleidy Cegarra

customer_reviews.title: Really useful
customer_reviews.text: This mommy helper kit has the medicine spoons, nail cutter, ice pack.. all the basics in one little convenient pouch. They all work well. Although I do use my own thermometer, I like it for the consolidation of essentials it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Has everything a new mommy needs. I would suggest though that you get one of those thermometer covers to add to your kit.
customer_reviews.author: Swati B

customer_reviews.title: Best set on the market
customer_reviews.text: The nail clippers are great. I've been using since LO was 6 weeks old. The other items are all good too and it's nice having them in all one place. I did lots of research on different kits before buying and I'm glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Horrible first aid kit ****Do not buy***
customer_reviews.text: I have never given 1 star review before, but this item deserve it. I never used anything but the thermometer, and the Ice pack dyed out. The nasal bulb broke before I could ever use it. ****** Do not purchase Kit*********** Stephanie Hudson
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Love this and everything in it
customer_reviews.text: Love this and everything in it. It's s buy fancy (alot more stuff than I expected. Great quality of products and a steal of a deal. Don't fancy the comb though.
customer_reviews.author: Kisrael

customer_reviews.title: The only things really helpful and good for the price is the brush and somehow the ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. The only things really helpful and good for the price is the brush and somehow the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Frias

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, havent had a chance to use it yet ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, havent had a chance to use it yet but everything looks good and quality looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice....
customer_reviews.text: When the baby gets home you really need all these stuff or most of it..... i recomend tha you have one of thes around..... these bundle dose the job for it's money....
customer_reviews.author: Jorge B.

customer_reviews.title: Mommy's Helper Nursery Essentials Mommys Helper
customer_reviews.text: the production is very good. my friend is very love it . i want it better packing. very like it

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer not working and the cold pack had a whole so all the solution ran out
customer_reviews.author: Dillion

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was very cheep and came just like it looks in the picture. Can't wait to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Amber Reyes

customer_reviews.title: mommys help
customer_reviews.text: Sent this item as a gift for my niece.She was very pleased with the product! I can recommend it as a gift for any mother to be!
customer_reviews.author: brilly

customer_reviews.title: Mommy's Helper Nursery Essentials
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you see in the package, the price should be less but if you went to the 99 cent store you probably would pay more money. Lucky this item ships for free.
customer_reviews.author: Unique L Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit! Came with everything I needed for my newest baby! Theses hold up threw 2 children!
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: I do not get my order
customer_reviews.text: I have not my order, send emails to give me answers and nothing, so I will give a bad grade because I have no answers
customer_reviews.author: Estilimar

customer_reviews.title: great baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Great baby shower gift. Comes with just about all that a new mother would need to help with their baby.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette young

product_meta.title: Mommy's Helper Nursery Essentials
product_meta.description:
The Nursery Essentials kit is the ultimate grooming kit from Mommy's Helper and includes all of the baby care items you will need. The 14 piece set includes storage case, nasal aspirator, infant gum massager, digital thermometer, medicine spoon, medicine dropper, comb, brush, fingernail clippers, emory boards and Boo Boo pack. It also has a convenient storage case.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Nursery Essentials kit is the ultimate grooming kit from Mommy's Helper and includes all of the baby care items you will need. The 14 piece set includes storage case, nasal aspirator, infant gum massager, digital thermometer, medicine spoon, medicine dropper, comb, brush, fingernail clippers, emory boards and Boo Boo pack. It also has a convenient storage case.
feature_bullets: Includes all of the baby care items you will need
Includes storage case, nasal aspirator, infant gum massager, digital thermometer, medicine spoon
